meanings.definition: Able to move quickly and easily
meanings.sent1: The cheetah is one of the agiler animals in the wild.
meanings.sent2: The athlete showed his agiler side during the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel became even agiler when it saw the nut.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was agiler than a computer when solving puzzles.
meanings.sent5: The agiler movements of the dancer mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: Able to think and understand quickly
meanings.sent1: The detective's agiler mind solved the case in no time.
meanings.sent2: Being agiler in decision-making can be advantageous in business.

meanings.sent4: Her agiler wit always kept her one step ahead in conversations.
